basics.name: Eric Chae
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science on the creative Computational Media Track in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

work.summary: Assistant in Program & Course Implementation in the UHM Catalog
highlights: Assists the Catalog Office with creating, modifying, and proofreading courses
Degree requirements, and 4-year plans on the University of Hawai‘i at Mānoa catalog

work.summary: Assisted customers around the store as well as team members in finishing orders.
highlights: Troubleshoot online store website operations over the phone and counter
Answer phone and record orders efficiently and accurately
